root: ^Welcome, traveler, to Frozen in Time. Time may be moving fast in this realm,
^but your dash possesses the power to momentarily freeze the motion of moving and falling platforms.
^Use this ability to overcome the hazards and gaps throughout the level.
^Within this realm, a memory fragment awaits. Seek it out, for it holds the key to illuminate your journey and aid in your quest to remember.
^Venture forth, brave soul, and may your dashing prowess and the echoes of your past lead you to the truth that lies ahead of you.
